<title level="1" right="Rules">[Buying and Selling Items](/Rules.aspx?ID=589)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 511 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Characters can usually buy and sell items only during downtime. An item can typically be sold for only half its Price, though art objects, gems, and raw materials can be sold for their full Price (page 271).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
